name: A for Adventure
description:
This is a first step in what is likely a long, long journey...
This is a complete single-player RPG on a single piece of A4.

Featuring:
  • Character creation
  • Skills & abilities
  • Inventory
  • Procedural dungeon map
  • Battles, traps & hazards
  • Guided rolling and mostly maths-free play
  • Character advancement
  • Every game is different
All on one side of A4＊

＊Plus you need a pen and some dice...

Why?!

RPGs are often super complicated to get into, until recent Jams showed how much fun was possible with print-at-home RPGs. The difficulty was these games were often really the instructions rather than the game. And if you've ever played Pokemon, you know that instructions aren't fun...

This game aims to take the great ideas out there, and condense everything into a single page - all the instructions, all the play area, everything!

Really hope you like it - comment if you want more!
